title: Add ARIA labels to password toggle buttons
overview: Add aria-label attributes to password visibility toggle buttons in login and registration forms to improve accessibility for screen reader users. The labels should dynamically reflect the current action (Show/Hide password).

phases.name: Add ARIA labels to password toggle buttons
phases.description: Add dynamic aria-label attributes to all password toggle buttons across the authentication forms

subtasks.title: Add aria-label to login form password toggle
subtasks.description: Add dynamic aria-label to the password toggle button in login-form.tsx. Label should be 'Show password' when hidden and 'Hide password' when visible.
subtasks.notes: Successfully added dynamic aria-label to password toggle button in login-form.tsx. The label shows 'Show password' when hidden and 'Hide password' when visible.

subtasks.title: Add aria-label to register form password toggle
subtasks.description: Add dynamic aria-label to the password toggle button in register-form.tsx. Label should be 'Show password' when hidden and 'Hide password' when visible.
subtasks.notes: Successfully added dynamic aria-label to password toggle button in register-form.tsx. The label shows 'Show password' when hidden and 'Hide password' when visible.

subtasks.title: Add aria-label to register form confirm password toggle
subtasks.description: Add dynamic aria-label to the confirm password toggle button in register-form.tsx. Label should be 'Show confirm password' when hidden and 'Hide confirm password' when visible.
subtasks.notes: Successfully added dynamic aria-label to the confirm password toggle button in register-form.tsx. The label shows 'Show confirm password' when hidden and 'Hide confirm password' when visible.
